text: Nagra 4'a kankamu retro hu'na ana vahera zamahe hana hugahue huno Ra Anumzamo'a hu'ne. Nagra hanuge'za ha' vahe'mo'za bainati kazinteti zamahe nefrisage'za, kraramimo'za zamavufaga avazuvaze hu'za nefresage'za, namamo'za zamavufaga tagnataganu hu'za nenesage'za mesiama'a afi zaga kafamo'za ne'za eri hana hugahaze.
